text: Oberschneiding is a municipality in Straubing-Bogen in Bavaria, Germany. It is in the south of the "GÃ¤uboden", a very high-producing area famous for its agriculture. Today's municipality of Oberschneiding has 31 villages previously organized in five different municipalities (Grossenpinning, Niederschneiding, Oberschneiding, Reissing and Wolferkofen). The biggest town and seat of the municipality is Oberschneiding. ==References== Category:Straubing-Bogen
title: Oberschneiding
